actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to permit the referral to drug counseling or treatment programs of certain first-time marijuana offenders and to remove certain age restrictions against the expunging of certain official records.

summary.text: Permits the referral to drug counseling or treatment programs under the Controlled Substances Act of first-time marihuana offenders. Removes the age restrictions against the expunging of official records upon the dismissal or discharge of legal proceedings against the individual.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to permit the referral to drug counseling or treatment programs of certain first-time marijuana offenders and to remove certain age restrictions against the expunging of certain official records.
